      • isStateBetween

        public static boolean isStateBetween(GeckoThread.State minState,
                                     GeckoThread.State maxState)
        Check that the current Gecko thread state falls into an inclusive range of states, according to the order defined in the State enum.
        Parameters:
        minState - Lower range of allowable states
        maxState - Upper range of allowable states
        Returns:
        True if the current Gecko thread state matches
